game.name: Pixelar Vehicle Wars
game.description:
Pixelar: Vehicle Wars is an awesome first-person war game where you will have to control a range of beautifully-designed high-tech vehicles. This brand new shooter game features the fabulous pixelated graphics that have a resemblance to the Minecraft and addictive gameplay. Dive deep into this excellent adventure game and enjoy an opportunity to pilot various different vehicles, including a gunship helicopter and a mini tank. This environment will definitely bring you a completely new gaming experience.  

Be careful while getting engaged in fierce machine battles where quick responses and sharp eyes will help you to gain advantages over the opponents. Lead your team towards the victory in this free online 3D adventure game for boys. Go solo and try to take on the whole world on your own. Choose whatever you like and see yourself conquering this pixelated arena. All enemy parties try to meet with each, so keep your eyes on them. Find out a way to transport soldiers via long distances between battlefields shortly in this one of the best fighting games 3d.  

Remember the weight of powerful weapons is too heavy, so there is no chance for them to reach you. Kill as many opponents as you can and collect the maximum points to unlock many new awesome vehicles. In the first part, you will find 2 light armored vehicles and 2 helicopters. The bloodthirsty battlefields vary from a number of ladders and streets to a flat plain. Choose your favorite map and focus on achieving the goal in this cool PC game for boys!
